      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_6c53b7791b599ff58c65a2ad202db82d49e83372</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Balanced forces in a tug of war</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgeglichene Kräfte in einem Schlepper des 
Krieges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces équilibrées dans une traction subite de 
guerre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças equilibradas em um reboque da guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze equilibrate in una tirata della guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισορροπημένες δυνάμεις σε μια διελκυστίνδα του πολέμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas equilibradas en un tirón de la guerra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration of tug of war shows that equal forces but in opposite directions balance out so the rope does not move.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equal forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">opposite directions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tug of war</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung des Schleppers des Krieges zeigt, 
daß gleiche Kräfte aber in den entgegengesetzten Richtungen aus 
ausgleichen, also das Seil nicht bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration de traction subite de guerre 
prouve que les forces égales mais dans des directions opposées 
équilibrent hors de ainsi la corde ne se déplace pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração do reboque da guerra mostra que 
as forças iguais mas em sentidos opostos balançam para fora de assim
que a corda não se move.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione della tirata della guerra 
indica che le forze uguali ma nei sensi opposti equilibrano verso 
l'esterno in modo da la corda non si muove.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση της διελκυστίνδας του πολέμου 
δείχνει ότι οι ίσες δυνάμεις αλλά στην αντίθετη ισορροπία 
κατευθύνσεων έξω έτσι το σχοινί δεν κινούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración del tirón de la guerra muestra 
que las fuerzas iguales pero en direcciones opuestas balancean fuera 
de así que la cuerda no se mueve.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gleiche Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">entgegengesetzte Richtungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlepper des Krieges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forces égales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">directions opposées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">corde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traction subite de guerre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">forças iguais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentidos opostos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reboque da guerra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forze uguali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sensi opposti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tirata della guerra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ίσες δυνάμεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίθετες κατευθύνσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχοινί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διελκυστίνδα του πολέμου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerzas iguales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">direcciones opuestas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuerda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tirón de la guerra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
